meanings: date, go out (with), have a (romantic) relationship (with)

vlive.korean: 연애를 해~ 어? Why don't you date someone? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 눈 마주친 여자와 키스했다 [키스요괴] EP01 우연의 시작
나보고 연애를 또 하라고? Are you telling me to go out with a guy? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 눈 마주친 여자와 키스했다 [키스요괴] EP01 우연의 시작
vlive.english: Are you telling me to go out with a guy?

vlive.korean: 그게 뭔데요? 그거 연애 아니에요? What is that? Isn't that on love? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 같이 먹어요
vlive.english: What is that? Isn't that on love?

vlive.korean: 나 연애하는 건 어떻게 알았는데? How did you know I was dating someone? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 수상한 그녀 [가두리횟집] EP10
vlive.english: How did you know I was dating someone?

vlive.korean: 연애한다고 사람이 이렇게 달라지시나? How can you change so much just because you're dating someone? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 수상한 그녀 [가두리횟집] EP10
vlive.english: How can you change so much just because you're dating someone?

examples.english: She’s a compulsive reader of romances. 발음
